name: Nebula Quest
description:
A side scrolling space shoot em' up made in Game Maker Studio 2!

This was used as a learning project, as such it only has three playable levels.  I would call this more of a 'semi-polished demo'. This was a longer process than I anticipated with many 'false starts' along the way. I learned A TON from this project, but with that being said, I won't be continuing development on it any further(outside of any major game breaking bugs or crashes). Any feedback is welcome! I will gladly take any critique and funnel it into my future endeavors. Thank you!
